CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: With deep understanding of efficient photoinduced electron transfer within an interpenetrating network by simple blending π-conjugated polymers ( electron donor ) with fullerene derivatives ( electron acceptor ) , 1 bulk - heterojunction ( BHJ ) polymer solar cells ( PSCs ) based on poly(3-hexylthiophene) ( P3HT ) : [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester ( PCBM ) have been extensively investigated , leading to great progress in power conversion efficiencies ( PCEs ) of 4-5 % .

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| --- |
| π-conjugated polymers |
| fullerene derivatives |
| poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT) |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

The entities identified as "Material Name" are: 

1. π-conjugated polymers
2. fullerene derivatives
3. poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)
4. [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM)

These entities are materials that are either being blended or used in the bulk-heterojunction polymer solar cells (PSCs) mentioned in the paragraph.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| --- |

| fullerene derivatives |
| poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT) |
| [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM) |

After re-evaluating the paragraph, all identified entities are materials and are clear references to "Material Name". No entities need to be removed. The entities are:

1. π-conjugated polymers
2. fullerene derivatives
3. poly(3-hexylthiophene) (P3HT)
4. [6,6]-phenyl C 61 -butyric acid methyl ester (PCBM)

These entities are mentioned as materials that are either being blended or used in the bulk-heterojunction polymer solar cells (PSCs) mentioned in the paragraph.
